extra.enrollment_requirement: (MATH128 AND MATH118) OR (MATH128 AND MATH129) OR (MATH12## AND MATH11##) OR (APSC171 AND APSC172) OR (APSC171 AND APSC174)

basic.description: Review of multiple integrals. Differentiation and integration of vectors; line, surface and volume integrals; gradient, divergence and curl; conservative fields and potential. Spherical and cylindrical coordinates, solid angle. Green's and Stokes' theorems, the divergence theorem. (36/0/0/0/0)
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Vector Analysis
